data.title: Pendrecht: Buildings by Women · Rotterdam Architecture Month
data.meta_description: Buildings by Women and the Day and Night of Architecture join forces. There is still little knowledge about the significance of women in architecture. Their work is often unknown or hard to find, while countless…
data.text:
Buildings by Women and the Day and Night of Architecture join forces. There is still little knowledge about the significance of women in architecture. Their work is often unknown or hard to find, while countless examples can be cited.

Discover the role of women in the design and architecture of the Southern Garden City Pendrecht during this bicycle tour. Guide Marly Weemen (Timeless Rotterdam) will take you through the story of urban planner Lotte Stam-Beese. An inspiring journey highlighting the prominent role of women in (recent) architectural history.

Practical info

Bring your own bike.

Enjoy Rotterdam from early in the morning until deep into the night with tours, workshops, films and performances during the Day and Night of Architecture. You can find the programme on the website.

Photo: Stadsarchief Rotterdam
